HediffDef.label: zombiefied
HediffDef.description: Bacterial infection in a wound. Without treatment, the bacteria will multiply, killing local tissue, and eventually causing blood poisoning and death.\nThrough aeons of human warfare, infections have often taken more lives than the wounds themselves.
